metadata.title: Ondřej Pták | Fullstack developer
metadata.description: I specialize in designing and building modern, responsive web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences and drive business growth.

description.0: I am a 19 year old Czech Fullstack developer who has been interested in programming since 8th grade.
description.1: I specialize in web application development and I am currently working on several projects that I will be happy to show you.
description.2: I am currently in my last year of high school specializing in application development.

buffet.title: SPŠE a VOŠ | Buffet reservation
buffet.description: I created the entire frontend for the meal reservation system in the school buffet. The project was part of the graduation project at SPŠE and VOŠ in Pilsen 2024/2025.
buffet.detailedDescription: I created the entire frontend for the meal reservation system in the school buffet. The project was part of the graduation project at SPŠE and VOŠ 2024/2025. It allows users to browse the menu, add items to the cart, and place orders. Administrators can manage the menu, orders, and user accounts.
